mapper.select: SELECT o.`name` as orgName, p.org_id as orgId, p.project_id as projectId, j.project_name as projectName, p.plan_total as planTotal, p.`year`, p.`month`, p.plan_using as planUsing, p.id, p.create_time as createTime, p.update_time as updateTime, p.status, p.user_id as userId FROM plan p INNER JOIN organization o ON o.id = p.org_id INNER JOIN projects j ON j.id = p.project_id where p.is_delete=0 and p.id=#{id}
